Hero.description: IFAN Marketing Manager | Gen Z Creator from Yiwu.
Hero.slogan: Marketing Mind. Developer Hands. Design Soul.

About.title: Born in the Heart of Global Commerce.
About.origin: Born in Yiwu, China — the center of the world's supermarket. Growing up immersed in the flow of commerce has given me a natural sensitivity to traffic and transactions.
About.career: I don't just understand foreign trade; I understand how to leverage technology to move markets. Currently Marketing Manager at IFAN, dedicated to building omni-channel marketing systems driven by data.
About.nameStory: Justin / Du Jingwei. Keep it Short, Keep it OK. "It's OK, asking Du Jingwei." Reliable and straightforward — that's my style.

growth.description: Building brand walls, not just selling products.
